name: Survive The Box Attack!!
description:
I am not the one that made this game all the credit goes to @DogeFan1555

Official Game: Survive (100% Pen)

My Remix: Survive (100% Pen) 2.0

Music is "Chaoz Fantasy" by ParagonX9
Sound effects from @theChAOTiC and the Scratch library

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.

The space key or click to shoot.
Point the mouse in the direction that you want to shoot in.
